con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="HelloService" targetNamespace="http://course/hello" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://course/hello" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://course/hello" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="sayOperation" type="tns:sayOperation"/> <xs:element name="sayOperationResponse" type="tns:sayOperationResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="sayOperation"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="tns:NameType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="NameType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="firsName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="lastName" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="sayOperationResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element form="qualified" minOccurs="0" name="greeting" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="FaultType"> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="msg" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="EmptyName" nillable="true" type="tns:FaultType"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="EmptyNameException"> <wsdl:part element="tns:EmptyName" name="EmptyNameException"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sayOperation"> <wsdl:part element="tns:sayOperation" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="sayOperationResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:sayOperationResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="Hello"> <wsdl:operation name="sayOperation"> <wsdl:input message="tns:sayOperation" name="sayOperation"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:sayOperationResponse" name="sayOperationResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:EmptyNameException" name="EmptyNameException"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="HelloServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:Hello"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="sayOperation"> <soap:operation soapAction="sayHello" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="sayOperation"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="sayOperationResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="EmptyNameException"> <soap:fault name="EmptyNameException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="HelloService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:HelloServiceSoapBinding" name="HelloPort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/helloworld/HelloService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
